Snake

Class Snake

  • java.lang.Object
    • Snake.Snake

  • public class Snake
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a snake.

    • Method Detail

      • moveSnake

        public void moveSnake(char ke)
        Updates the direction of this snake according to a string input Only responds to the following chars: - "w" - "a" - "s" - "d"
        Parameters:
        ke - - the string that determine the change of direction

      • moveSnake

        private void moveSnake()
        Moves the snake according to one tick of time having passed. Movement is determine by the local value this.direction.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if direction is not one the expected values

      • handleOnTick

        public boolean handleOnTick(java.util.List<Food> loFood,
                            int width,
                            int height,
                            boolean doWallsKill)
        * Updates the snake based of one tick of time having passed. This consists of: - eating food snake is touching - adding any eaten foods onto the tail of the snake if at tail - moving the snake - determining if snake has hit itself
        Parameters:
        loFood - a list of all the food that the snake can e
        width - width of the grid snake is in
        height - height of grid snake is in
        doWallsKill - true if walls kill, false if they don't
        Returns:
        true if game snake is alive, false if dead

      • processAddedBodyCells

        private void processAddedBodyCells()
        Adds already eatten body cells to the tail if they are not colliding with the head of the tail.

      • foodCollision

        private void foodCollision(java.util.List<Food> loFood,
                           int width,
                           int height)
        Checks if the snake has hit food. If it has creates another food and adds a Snake.BodyCell to the snake
        Parameters:
        loFood - list of food in snake game
        width - width of grid
        height - height of grid

      • snakeCollision

        private boolean snakeCollision()
        Determines if the snake has hit itself
        Returns:
        true if collision, false otherwise

      • handleBoundries

        private boolean handleBoundries(int width,
                                int height,
                                boolean doWallsKill)
        Checks the snakes boundry behavior. If walls kill and snake hits wall it dies. Otherwise it is reset to continue moving from the wall opposite to the one it hit.
        Parameters:
        width - width of grid
        height - height of grid
        doWallsKill - setting of whether the snake should die of wall hit
        Returns:
        true if snake lives, false if it dies

      • addBodyCell

        public void addBodyCell(BodyCell bc)
        Takes the body cell and stores it until it is appropriate to add it to the snake
        Parameters:
        bc - - the Snake.BodyCell to be added onto the snake
